wf_workflow_version.name: Section I
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_activity.name: Alert Finance to Modified Section I

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear Finance,
HR has modified and approved ${sys_created_by} 's training reimbursement form for immediate reimbursement (section 1) and needs your approval. The original record id is: ${number}. A task is currently being generated for you. Please go to your tasks and approve or reject HR's modification.
IT

Dear Finance,
HR has modified and approved ${sys_created_by} 's training reimbursement form for immediate reimbursement (section 1) and needs your approval. The original record id is: ${number}. A task is currently being generated for you. Please go to your tasks and approve or reject HR's modification.
IT
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Alert Finance to Modified Section I

wf_activity.name: Alert HR to Rejected Section I

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Dear HR,
Finance has rejected ${sys_created_by} 's training reimbursement form for immediate reimbursement (section 1). The original record id is: ${number}. A new task is being generated for you. Please go back and make the appropriate modifications or reject it if necessary.
IT

Dear HR,
Finance has rejected ${sys_created_by} 's training reimbursement form for immediate reimbursement (section 1). The original record id is: ${number}. A new task is being generated for you. Please go back and make the appropriate modifications or reject it if necessary.
IT
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Alert HR to Rejected Section I

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

Dear ${sys_created_by},
Your reimbursement form has been rejected. Please go to your original record for more details.
IT

Dear ${sys_created_by},
Your reimbursement form has been rejected. Please go to your original record for more details.
IT

Dear Finance,
${sys_created_by} has submitted a section 1 form that needs approval.
Best, IT
